content: turtle dove v-neck designed by melissa clulow the turtle dove v-neck is a pullover reinterpretation of the popular turtle dove cardigan pattern sharing the same relaxed gauge but introducing a fresh combination of yarns this versatile design features a simple stockinette body accentuated by deep raglans and twisted rib details at the neckline center front panel and cuffs knit from the top down this effortlessly stylish sweater pairs seamlessly with jeans tunics dresses or even your coziest weekend loungewear sonder yarn co | sonderyarnco com | @sonderyarnco | #sonderyarnco turtle dove v-neck | page 2 sizes gauge 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 16 sts x 21 row to 4 / 10 cm on us 9 / 5 5 mm needles in st st after blocking recommended ease 12 14 / 30 5 35 5 cm of positive ease special techniques loop and then pull the second loop length from underarm to hem 8 5 9 9 9 5 9 5 10 10 5 through the first loop * repeat * * across the row until 11 11 5 / 21 5 22 5 22 5 24 24 25 5 26 5 28 29 cm beginning of right ribbing panel cut yarn and pull through sleeve length 9 / 23 cm last loop upper arm circumference 12 5 13 25 13 5 14 75 16 17 18 5 19 75 21 25 / 31 5 33 34 37 40 42 5 46 5 49 5 53
